entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
